text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @HARRISFAULKNER @FoxNews •
Trump administration won’t say who got $511 billion in taxpayer-backed coronavirus
•
Josh Hawley (R-Mo.) “How are we going to conduct oversight if you won’t give us any of the details?”
•
https://t.co/QKvdc6foGa
